about.title: Ruby Wu
about.subtitle: Full Stack Software Engineer
about.professional_summary_text: Senior Front-End Engineer with 7 years of experience transitioning into Human-Computer Interaction. Possesses a unique "T-shaped" background combining a Bachelor's degree in Editing & Publishing (Content Strategy/Information Architecture) with extensive technical expertise in Web Development and AI Integration. Proven track record of bridging the gap between design concepts and technical implementation in EdTech and HealthTech sectors. Seeking to leverage rapid prototyping skills and user-centric mindset in the MHCI program at Carleton University.
about.education_degree: Bachelor of Arts in Editing and Publishing
about.education_coursework_list: Educational Psychology, Communication Theory, Web Editing, Visual Aesthetics, Information Organization.
about.education_note: Note: Developed a foundational understanding of how users consume information and the psychology behind content interaction.
about.skills_hci_design_list: Rapid Prototyping, Information Architecture, Accessibility (A11y), Responsive Design, User Flow Analysis, UI Implementation
about.skills_frontend_list: Vue.js ecosystem (VuePress, Element UI), JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5/CSS3, WebRTC
about.skills_ai_list: LLM Integration (ChatGPT, Claude), RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), Prompt Engineering, AI Agent Workflows (n8n, Dify)
about.position_1_context: Context: A leading K-12 reading education platform in China.
about.position_1_project_1_desc: Led the front-end development of the "Yi Mi Reading" App (H5 pages), Yimi Reading Website and WeChat Mini Program. Collaborated closely with Product Managers and Designers to iterate on UI features and engagement for student users.
about.position_1_project_2_desc: Spearheaded the development of an internal AI-powered Q&A system based on Dify. Designed the interaction flow that allowed employees to retrieve corporate knowledge instantly, reducing information retrieval time by 30%.
about.position_1_project_3_desc: Refactored legacy codebases for the official website, improving page load speeds and ensuring smoother interactions across different devices (Mobile/Desktop).
about.position_1_project_4_desc: Developed the internal OA and BI (Business Intelligence) systems, transforming complex operational data into intuitive visual dashboards for decision-makers.
about.position_2_context: Context: A medical imaging AI startup focused on cancer screening.
about.position_2_project_1_desc: Collaborated with medical professionals to develop the front-end interfaces for Lung CT and Breast Ultrasound diagnostic systems. Focused on high-fidelity rendering of medical images to support doctors in accurate diagnosis.
about.position_2_project_2_desc: Developed a Ward Management System based on direct feedback from partner hospitals. Streamlined the digital workflow for nurses and doctors, reducing administrative friction.
about.position_2_project_3_desc: Acted as the bridge between AI algorithm engineers and clinical users, ensuring the technical output was presented in a user-friendly interface.
about.position_3_project_1_desc: Managed the lifecycle of book publishing, from manuscript editing to final proofreading.
about.position_3_project_2_desc: Responsible for the information architecture and content updates of the company's official website, sparking an initial interest in web technologies.
